summary: Provides an alarm control panel entity that delegates arming, disarming and mode changes to IFTTT events, validates optional security codes, and keeps its state in sync with external IFTTT services, supporting optimistic state handling.
business_intent: Allow Home Assistant users to control and monitor alarm systems through IFTTT, enabling remote or automated arming and disarming via IFTTT triggers and ensuring the panel state reflects external actions.
